name: MPMediaItem
desc: A collection of properties that represents a single item contained in the media library.

items.name: var albumArtist: String?
items.desc: The primary performing artist for an album.

items.name: var albumArtistPersistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for the primary performing artist for an album.

items.name: var albumPersistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for an album.

items.name: var albumTitle: String?
items.desc: The title of an album, such as Live on Mars, rather than the title of an individual song on the album, such as “Crater Dance.”

items.name: var albumTrackCount: Int
items.desc: The number of tracks for the album that contains the media item.

items.name: var albumTrackNumber: Int
items.desc: The track number of the media item, for a media item that is part of an album.

items.name: var artist: String?
items.desc: The performing artists for a media item — which may vary from the primary artist for the album that a media item belongs to.

items.name: var artistPersistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for an artist.

items.name: var artwork: MPMediaItemArtwork?
items.desc: The artwork image for the media item.

items.name: var assetURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL that points to the media item.

items.name: var beatsPerMinute: Int
items.desc: The number of musical beats per minute for the media item.

items.name: var bookmarkTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time of the user’s most recent interaction with the bookmark in the media item.

items.name: var isCloudItem: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item is an iCloud Music Library item.

items.name: var comments: String?
items.desc: Textual information about the media item.

items.name: var isCompilation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item is part of a compilation.

items.name: var isPreorder: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item is a preorder.

items.name: var composer: String?
items.desc: The musical composer for the media item.

items.name: var composerPersistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for a composer.

items.name: var dateAdded: Date
items.desc: The date the user adds the media item to the library.

items.name: var discCount: Int
items.desc: The number of discs for the album that contains the media item.

items.name: var discNumber: Int
items.desc: The disc number of the media item, for a media item that is part of a multidisc album.

items.name: var isExplicitItem: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item has explicit (adult) lyrics or language.

items.name: var genre: String?
items.desc: The music or film genre of the media item.

items.name: var genrePersistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for a genre.

items.name: var lastPlayedDate: Date?
items.desc: The most recent play date of the media item.

items.name: var lyrics: String?
items.desc: The lyrics for the media item.

items.name: var mediaType: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media type of the media item.

items.name: var persistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for the media item.

items.name: var playCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the user plays the media item.

items.name: var playbackDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The playback duration of the media item.

items.name: var playbackStoreID: String
items.desc: The nonlibrary identifier for a media item.

items.name: var podcastPersistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for an audio podcast.

items.name: var podcastTitle: String?
items.desc: The title of a podcast, such as This Martian Drudgery, rather than the title of an individual episode of a podcast, such as “Episode 12: Another Cold Day at the Pole.”

items.name: var hasProtectedAsset: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item has a protected asset.

items.name: var rating: Int
items.desc: The user-specified rating of the media item.

items.name: var releaseDate: Date?
items.desc: The date of the media item’s first public release.

items.name: var skipCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the user skips playing the media item.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title or name of the media item.

items.name: var userGrouping: String?
items.desc: Grouping information for the media item.

items.name: class func persistentIDProperty(forGroupingType: MPMediaGrouping) -> String
items.desc: Obtains the persistent identifier key for a specified grouping type.

items.name: class func titleProperty(forGroupingType: MPMediaGrouping) -> String
items.desc: Obtains the title key for a specified grouping type.

items.name: struct MPMediaType
items.desc: The properties for defining the type for a media item.
